title: Unable to connect to PVP-Window 8.1 help
body: yo. I need some help here. everytime after champ select, I get a message saying "unable toconnect to server. please check internet connection." My wifi is find, but the game is wack. I've done everything I can find related to this problem, but none of them helped. Help me and I'll love you

replies.body:
Hey there. It definitely sounds like there are some issues to our servers, as the error you're seeing usually means that something is wack with your local network settings. I recommend you work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure that this is not the case and that your local network settings have been properly configured for League.

Let me know if this was unable to resolve your issue.
